allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add instrument modules, BaseDataLogger template, and standardize naming

Major additions:
- Add Agilent 34405A DMM control module
- Add Digilent Analog Discovery 2 control module
- Add BaseDataLogger template for consistent data logging
- Add development guide documentation

Features:
- Elapsed time tracking (ms from test start)
- Precise timing compensation (not just time.sleep)
- Buffered Excel output with dual-file system
- Trigger sweep mode (AUTO/NORM) and holdoff settings
- Default resource strings for lab instruments
- NTC temperature calculation (Beta equation)

Standardization:
- File naming: <Project>_<instruments>_<measurements>.py
- All loggers must inherit from BaseDataLogger
- Standard columns: Timestamp, measurements, Elapsed Time (ms)

Files renamed to follow naming convention:
- vrms_logger.py -> PAPAPIN_dsox4034a_vrms.py
- vrms_logger_fast.py -> PAPAPIN_dsox4034a_vrms-fast.py
- find_instruments.py -> GENERAL_all_find-instruments.py
- read_scope_settings.py -> GENERAL_dsox4034a_read-scope-settings.py

New project scripts:
- PAPAPIN_dsox4034a-a34405a_vrms-temp.py
- PAPAPIN_dsox4034a-ad2_vrms-temp.py

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
